competitors.name: Xero
competitors.notes: Major cloud accounting competitor, strong globally for SMBs

competitors.name: FreshBooks
competitors.notes: Cloud accounting for service businesses, freelancers, entrepreneurs

competitors.name: Wave Financial
competitors.notes: Free accounting software with invoicing and reporting (acquired by H&R Block in 2020)

competitors.name: H&R Block
competitors.notes: Top tax preparation competitor with 12,000+ physical locations, acquired Wave

competitors.name: TaxACT
competitors.notes: Best tax software for independent contractors, founded 1998

competitors.name: Credit Karma
competitors.notes: Free tax filing competitor (acquired by Intuit for $7B in 2020)

context: 2020 was transformative for Intuit. The company acquired Credit Karma for over $7 billion. H&R Block acquired Wave Financial. The accounting software market was fully cloud-based.
